oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to colophon (f. 28r), copy completed on 24 Muḥarram 1192 [February 22, 1778] in the hand of Muḥammad Amīn ibn ʻAlī Ṭāhir ibn Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad Qāsim.
With this is bound: Sharḥ Īsāghūjī / ʻImād ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī ʻAlī al-Fārisī (ff. 29v-60v) -- Ḥāshīyah ʻalá Tahdhīb al-manṭiq / ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Yazdī (ff. 61v-142v).
MS Arab 297. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
